title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.6 - Closing of declarations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.6 - Closing of declarations

State Regulations

All declarations for overnight events shall be closed not
less than 18 hours, and not more than four racing days, prior to the date on
which the race is scheduled. For overnights, stakes and all other races a
change in the ownership or training of a horse drawn to start is prohibited and
in the event such prohibited change occurs the horse shall be scratched and the
parties responsible therefor shall be subject to fine or
suspension. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4111.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
